Windlord/Kup/DeathStar:

Windlord sighed annoye, this problem was going after all controls. 
Kup said "Kitkat, You're not prisioner, you can left the base 
whenever you like even to go to Preds base... But you have to 
understand that Triped, Preds and Maximals are joined to save our 
lives.. and"

"Are we lefting????"said the harsh voice of DeathStar"Unicron won't 
wait that we built the gun to destroy him... And If Maximals offers 
more volunteers we could built that stuff fastest"

"I just need to fix some details and I'm ready..."said Windlord"Come 
Kup... we shoudl work quickly this suff.."

Kup nodded and looking to Cam said"Cam... I need an extra hand, 
could you come and help me?? "

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice walks into the CR room to see a room full of Maximals 
surrounding a Predacon.  The Predacon was familier, then he 
remembered.  She was the one he put in the CR chamber.
> "Well, is this how you repay me for saving your life?  Maybe next 
time I won't show the same compassion."
> He looked around again and saw little Camoflage.  He turned back 
to the Predacon.
> "You may not like an allience as much as me or another die hard 
Decepticon, but right now we need to hold one.  This is bigger than 
pride."
> 
> shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> KitKat::
> 
> Her ears perked up at Shadowcaster. She turned her head so he 
could 
> hear her,"I've turned more bots into paperclips than you've had 
hot 
> meals bot."  She then looked at Blackfang, "See, a pred at spark." 
> with a mischievious grin. 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> > Shadowcaster turned around to face Blackfang, relieved
> > that someone with some degree of maturity had come on
> > the scene.
> > 
> > "Finally a bot in this room who isn't acting like a
> > spark that came online 2 nanoclicks ago." he says this
> > shhoting acusing liooks at Kup, Windlord and at
> > Kitkat.
> > 
> > Noticing that Blackfang seems concerned as to her
> > safety, he decided to reassure him.
> > 
> > "Don't worry, while I had a vice like grip on her
> > while trying to get her to cool her cylanders, I
> > didn't damage her." 
> > 
> > Then feeling a little humor was required, he adds with
> > a somewhat surprisingly flippent tone,
> > 
> > "Don't worry Fang, as Ravage once said to Wheeljack,
> > if I wanted her dead, she'd be paperclips by now."
> > 
> >  --- Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote: 
> > ---------------------------------
> > Blackfang arrived and decided it was best to take
> > thing on himself - 
> > not that he didn't trust Shadowcaster, but he did find
> > his ways a 
> > bit drastic.
> > 
> > Blackfang: Thanks Shade, and you too, guys (he nods at
> > Windlord and 
> > Kup). If you allow, I can take care of her.
> > 
> > He then looks at KitKat. She did not seem okay, at
> > least not in her 
> > processors, and he felt pity towards her. He looks in
> > her eyes.
> > 
> > Blackfang: Hello KitKat... Do you remember me?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw
> > <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> > > When he saw she'd calmed down, he places her gently
> > on
> > > the floor. Never fails he thought. Chuckling at the
> > > situation, he decided to let her in on a secret.
> > > 
> > > "Nothing like a Decepticon to knock some snse into a
> > > Preadcon- by the way, did you ever consider that
> > maybe
> > > it's you who hates the matrix?"
> > > 
> > >  --- shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...>
> > > wrote: 
> > > ---------------------------------
> > > KitKat::
> > > 
> > > She was too startled to make sence of this huge bot
> > > who just picked 
> > > her up.  She transformed into wolf mode and started
> > > scrambling to get 
> > > out of his arms. "LET ME GO! I KNEW YOU WOULD TRY TO
> > > TORTURE ME! "  
> > > SHe struggled and squirmed trying to get out of his
> > > grip. "MAXIMALS 
> > > ARE AS TRETCHEROUS AS PREDACONS!"  She struggled
> > hard,
> > > but his grip 
> > > was firm.  She stopped as she felt her body reach
> > low
> > > energy levels. 
> > > She looked up at him as she lay in his arms, "Go
> > > ahead, kill me. Send 
> > > me to the pit for all I care. I'll just come back
> > > again. The matrix 
> > > hates me. So I shall never know peace." She was
> > still
> > > in wolf mode 
> > > and taking deep breaths. She almost felt like
> > crying,
> > > but a warrior 
> > > can never show true emotion or they show they are
> > > weak. She wimpered 
> > > once and then stopped. She lay still and waited for
> > > the bot to crush 
> > > her.  
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw
> > > <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> > > > Shadowcaster couldn't believe how childish
> > everyone
> > > > was acting- even beginning to wonder just how
> > Primus
> > > > could have been so patient with his children when
> > > they
> > > > clearly needed to grow up. He grabs Kitkat with
> > > > lightning speed in him hand (he's the size of
> > > Optimal
> > > > Optimus) and stares her down, making it clear that
> > > > enough is enough.
> > > > 
> > > > "I SAID THAT'S ENOUGH! UNICRON IS ABOUT TO COMMIT
> > > > MASSIVE TEMPORAL BUTCHERING IN THIS TIME AND
> > YOU'RE
> > > > BUSY PURSUING CHILDISH GRUDGES! I WONT SAY STAND
> > > DOWN
> > > > AGAIN!!!"
> > > > 
> > > > The look in his eyes said to drop it if she valued
> > > her
> > > > functionality.
> > > > 
> > > >  --- shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...>
> > > > wrote: 
> > > > ---------------------------------
> > > > KitKat::
> > > > 
> > > > SHe looked at Kup and let her memory chip remind
> > her
> > > > where she had 
> > > > met this bot before. He knew her but she couldn't
> > > > remember why. Yet 
> > > > he seemed familiar to her somehow. "Listen, first
> > > off,
> > > > I wasn't in 
> > > > your territory. Second, maximals and preds would
> > > never
> > > > have an 
> > > > allience. Third, if you do have such an allience,
> > > then
> > > > you'd release 
> > > > me instead of just thinking about lettimg me go.
> > And
> > > > another thing..."
> > > > She transformed into bot mode. Her sleek and matt
> > > > black finish was 
> > > > flawless. Her form was near perfect. Her wolf tail
> > > was
> > > > still behind 
> > > > her, swishing and wagging as she stood up with her
> > > > elegent hands on 
> > > > her well formed hips. She looked at Kup, "And
> > > another
> > > > thing, why save 
> > > > me if I'm a pred and your a maximal? Even if we
> > have
> > > > an allience, we 
> > > > are still and will always be eternal enemies. So
> > > > fixing me up does't 
> > > > make sence."  She thought about it some more.
> > > "Unless
> > > > we have a 
> > > > common enemy that is so great we need every bot we
> > > > have."
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000"
> > > > <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Windlord/Kup:::

> > > > > "What're you talking about, you...?"answer back

> > > > > 
> > > > > "WINDLORD!! calm down..."said camly Kup"Now,
> > > Kitkat,
> > > > we should 
> > > > clear 
> > > > > this... First of all, Kitkat, you're not a POW
> > > > 'cause we are not in 
> > > > > a conflict with preds, we have a temporal
> > alliance
> > > > with Preds; 
> > > > > Second, According with some reports caught by
> > our
> > > > sencors, you was 
> > > > > found wounded and almost in stasis in our
> > > territory,
> > > > so the most 
> > > > > natural thing is that we bring you to CR in
> > order
> > > to
> > > > get do a 
> > > > > reseach why are you in our territory; Third, is
> > > > Rodimus who will 
> > > > > decide what we should do with you: Realease you
> > or
> > > > not. Now Kitkat 
> > > > I 
> > > > > would like that you explain me why are you in
> > our
> > > > territory and why 
> > > > > was you wounded? "
> > > > > 
> > > > >

> > > waste
> > > > of metal. You 
> > > > > > brought me here. I don't know why, but what
> > ever
> > > > it is your 
> > > > > looking 
> > > > > > for, you won't get it from me." She growled
> > and
> > > > backed up untill 
> > > > > her 
> > > > > > tail touched the closed outside door of the CR
